title: You Shelter Me
description: Welcome to Crabapple Landing. A series of clean, small-town romances.He wanted to be left alone... until she landed on his doorstep.More than a decade ago, Dash McHardie enlisted so he could get away from the girl he'd always wanted, but would never have. Now he's home. All he wants is solitude and time to deal with his emotional wounds.Brooke Carrington just found out her fianc√© cheated on her. In her haste to get away, she finds herself stranded in a blizzard. The only house for miles belongs to Dash. The guy she'd had a powerful crush on right from the start.They're stuck with each other for days. Will they take advantage of this second chance?
author: Elle Fredrix
